DataElement.preferredName: Tissue Donor Hematopoietic Cell Transplantation Recipient Biological Relative Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The Yes/No indication of whether or not a the HSCT donor is biologically related to the recipient.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Tissue Donor Hematopoietic Cell Transplantation Recipient Biological Relative
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person._An individual receiving a hematopoietic cell transplant._A person related by descent rather than by marriage or law.

Concepts.definition: Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person.

A person related by descent rather than by marriage or law.
